The graph indicates the proportion of young people who have the vegetarian diet in UK between 1960 to 2020. There are different trend in different period which will be described.

Starting from 1960s, the percentage of adolescent vegetarians started to increase steeply from 1960 which had 0% to 1980 which had more than 15%, it reached the peak in 1980. After that, it dipped dramatically from 1980 to 1990 which had less than 10%, followed by a steady rise in the early of 1990. At that time, the trend started to drop gradually again to less than 5% until the mid of 1990. Since then, it fluctuated in around 5% until 2000s. There was a steady boost from 2000 to 2010. Since 2010, it has levelled off in around 10% thereafter.

In conclusion, the peak of the percentage reached to more than 15% in 1980. There was a sharply change before 1990, however, the trend of young vegetarians changed modestly until 2020.


唔該大家
想考academic

第一句 have the : were on a vegetarian diet / adopted a vegetarian diet
第二句 好生硬
第三句 from 0 in 1960s to over 15% in 1986

我冇考過ielts 其他聽日再睇

分清楚have/has 同is/are個啲
唔好係咁which

我跟住你咁寫 改左少少 雖然我寫野都唔叻 但都比你參考下

The graph indicates the proportion of teenagers adopting a vegetarian diet in the UK between 1960 to 2020.

As shown in the graph, the percentage of adolescents following a vegetarian diet increased substantially from 0% in 1960 to over 15% in 1980, which is the peak of the entire period.
During the 1980s, proportion of adolescent vegetarians in the UK continuously decreased and fell below 7.5% in 1990.
Afterwards, the percentage fluctuated during the 1990s and ended up with about 5% in 2000.
Subsequently, the percentage rose at a robust rate in the 2000s, reaching over 10% at the end of the decade.
As of 2010, the percentage remained roughly unchanged.

In conclusion, the percentage of adolescents adopting a vegetarian diet varies significantly between 1960 to 2010 and has remained rather stable as of 2010.
Between 後係跟and

The graph depicts the trend of the number of adolescents following a vegetarian diet. The trend started in 1960 and escalated sharply to the peak in 1980 at 15% and dropped to 6% in 1990. The figure fluctuated between 7 %in 1990 and 5% in2000 while it hit the lowest record in 1995 at a percentage of 4%. The number picked up an increasing trend again after 2000 and met another peak in 2013 which was 12%. The figure swelled gently to 11% in 2020. The historical high appeared in 1980 at 16% and the lowest occurred in 1995 at 4% which led to the difference of 12%.
